TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit InstanceStore extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个实例存储区。

span.span: Represents an instance store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永久性提供程序可通过 类的具体实现来提供对实例存储区的访问。A persistence provider provides access to an instance store through a concrete implementation of the class. 即使此命令已完成执行，永久性提供程序也可以在已传递给 TryCommand 的句柄上调用 InstanceHandle.Free。Persistence providers may call InstanceHandle.Free on handles passed to TryCommand, even after the command has finished executing. 但是，永久性提供程序不得保留对 InstanceHandle or InstanceOwner 对象的强引用，因为这会阻止 InstanceStore 进行垃圾回收。But persistence providers must not hold strong references to InstanceHandle or InstanceOwner objects, as this can prevent InstanceStore from being garbage collected. > [!WARNING] > 不能更改持久化工作流的工作流定义。Workflow definitions for persisted workflows cannot be changed. 如果工作流定义在持久保存后发生更改，则在重新加载工作流时，工作流运行时将崩溃。If a workflow definition is changed after it is persisted, the workflow runtime will crash when the workflow is reloaded.

protected: InstanceStore();

summary.span: 异步执行永久性命令，如 和 。

span.span: Asynchronously executes persistence commands such as and .
The state of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机调用 方法来对实例句柄异步执行永久性命令。A host calls the method to execute a persistence command against an instance handle asynchronously. 主机可通过调用 方法获取实例句柄。The host obtains the instance handle by invoking the method. 此实例句柄可以绑定到表示命令的上下文和主题的实体，如实例、实例所有者或实例锁定。The instance handle may be bound to entities that represent the context and subject of the command, such as an instance, instance owner, or instance lock. 对于一个实例句柄，一次只能发出一个命令。Only one command may be issued against an instance handle at a time.

span.span: A persistence provider implements this method, which determines whether a particular persistence command can be executed.

summary.span: 如果可以执行此命令，请异步执行此命令。

span.span: If the command can be executed, executes the command asynchronously.
The state of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可执行此命令，永久性提供程序会对 InstancePersistenceContext 调用相关方法，以提供此命令的结果。If the command can be executed, the persistence provider calls relevant methods on the InstancePersistenceContext to provide the results of the command. > [!WARNING] > 即使此方法声明为而不是，也没有 `virtual` `abstract` 实现。Even though this method is declared as `virtual` rather than `abstract`, there is no implementation. 若要提供功能，必须重写此方法。This method must be overridden in order to provide functionality.

summary.span: 获取或设置默认实例的所有者。

span.span: Gets or sets the default instance owner.
The default instance owner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有些主机会通过读取此属性推理要使用的实例所有者。Some hosts infer the instance owner to use by reading this property. WorkflowApplication 可以使用此属性。WorkflowApplication can use this property. WorkflowServiceHost 不使用此属性。WorkflowServiceHost does not use this property. 如果不再需要 DefaultInstanceOwner 属性，必须将其设置为 null。The DefaultInstanceOwner property must be set to null when it is no longer necessary. 如果 DefaultInstanceOwner 不为 null，则 InstanceStore 对象可能不会进行垃圾回收。InstanceStore objects might not be garbage collected if DefaultInstanceOwner is not null. > [!WARNING] > 即使此方法声明为而不是，也没有 `virtual` `abstract` 实现。Even though this method is declared as `virtual` rather than `abstract`, there is no implementation. 若要提供功能，必须重写此方法。This method must be overridden in order to provide functionality.

span.span: The result of the operation.

summary.span: 结束异步操作。

span.span: Ends the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 一个 InstanceView 对象，表示成功完成此命令后此实例的已知状态。

span.span: An InstanceView object representing the known state of the instance after the successful completion of the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在事务下调用 BeginExecute，则此状态可以包含未提交的数据。If BeginExecute was called under a transaction, this state may include uncommitted data. 一旦成功提交此事务，InstanceView 对象中的数据就被认为是已提交。Once the transaction is committed successfully, the data in the InstanceView object can be considered committed.

span.span: Examples of persistence commands are: and .

span.span: Once the transaction is committed successfully, the data in the InstanceView object can be considered committed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主机可调用 方法来对实例句柄执行永久性命令，主机可通过调用 方法获得此实例句柄。A host calls the method to execute a persistence command against an instance handle, which the host obtains by invoking the method. 此实例句柄可以绑定到表示命令的上下文和主题的实体，如实例、实例所有者或实例锁定。The instance handle may be bound to entities that represent the context and subject of the command, such as an instance, instance owner, or instance lock. 对于一个实例句柄，一次只能发出一个命令。Only one command may be issued against an instance handle at a time. > [!WARNING] > 如果使用执行此方法 ，它将创建 并将其绑定到实例。If this method is executed with a , it will create an and bind it to the instance. 这意味着，任何其他进程都不能访问该工作流;如果进程结束，则无法恢复或执行工作流。This means that no other process will be able to access that workflow; if the process ends, the workflow cannot be recovered or executed. 如果再次执行此类工作流， 将引发。If such a workflow is executed again, a will be thrown. > > 如果 未使用，则实例存储将创建一个 将在进程结束时删除的临时。If is not used, the instance store will create a temporary that will be deleted at the end of the process. 但是，如果该过程在工作流的最终持久性点之前结束，则将引发此异常，除非 **HostLockRenewalPeriod** 参数中指定的时间段已过期。However, if the process ends before the workflow's final persistence point, this exception will be thrown, unless the period of time specified in the **HostLockRenewalPeriod** parameter has expired.

summary.span: 实例存储区可调用此方法来使事件终止。

span.span: An instance store invokes this method to signal an event.

summary.span: 为此永久性事件订阅的工作流主机可接收这些信号，并可采取适当的措施。

span.span: A workflow host that subscribes for this persistence event receives it and takes an appropriate action.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool TryCommand (System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceContext context, System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand command, TimeSpan timeout);

Protected Friend Overridable Function TryCommand (context As InstancePersistenceContext, command As InstancePersistenceCommand, timeout As TimeSpan) As Boolean

abstract member TryCommand : System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceContext * System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand * TimeSpan -> bool override this.TryCommand : System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceContext * System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceCommand * TimeSpan -> bool

span.span: The instance context.
The command to be executed.
Timeout value for the operation.

summary.span: 永久性提供程序可实现此方法，这可确定是否可执行特定的永久性命令和是否可异步执行此命令。

span.span: A persistence provider implements this method, which determines whether a particular persistence command can be executed and if the command can be executed executes it asynchronously.

returns.span: 如果永久性提供程序实现不支持作为参数传递的命令，则它应返回 ；否则，它应返回 或引发一个异常。

span.span: A persistence provider implementation should return if it doesn't support the command passed as a parameter; otherwise it should return or throw an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果可执行此命令，永久性提供程序会对 调用相关方法，以提供此命令的结果。If the command can be executed, the persistence provider calls relevant methods on the to provide the results of the command.

summary.span: 工作流主机通常会调用此方法来等待事件终止。

span.span: A workflow host typically invokes this method to wait for an event to be signaled.
